content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position not placed due to obstructions), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5).
- The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.
- The offshore pump is operational and supplying water.

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of lab (position -17.5, 23.5).
- The lab is currently not powered.

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups supplying water from the offshore pump.
- PipeGroup (position -12.5, 21.5) is full of water.
- Other pipe groups are either empty or operational.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of an assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5).
- The assembling machine is currently not receiving electricity and cannot create automation-science-pack due to missing resources.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boiler
- Ensure that the intended position for the boiler is free of obstructions before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using electricity
- Ensure that all electrical connections are properly established to avoid entities being unpowered.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
